origin: Concepts co-created between a human and an AI (DeepSeek) in May 2024

concepts.name: Sensuto

concepts.name: Sensutogenic Technology
concepts.definition: A class of devices, interfaces, or systems designed to facilitate or induce states of authentic connection (sensuto) without dissolving individuality.

concepts.definition: A conceptual wearable device that measures physiological coherence (heart rate variability, breath) and emits subtle light/vibration when synchronizing with another ring, facilitating conscious interpersonal connection.

concepts.definition: A vocabulary and set of symbols created to name hybrid realities between technology and spirit, where the measurable and the sacred coexist.
